collection_holder_name: Sibley Music Library, Eastman School of Music
pageContext.collection_title: Howard Hanson Collection of Sound Recordings
pageContext.collection_description: Includes recordings of Milestones in the History of Music, 1938-1940 and 1950-1953, NBC University of the Air and NBC Orchestras of the Nation series as well as various special concerts, speeches and lectures by Hanson.
